ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_1031_02_10:
I’m so booored!
Calling all bored people!
Let’s do something!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_1031_03_10:
Come out, come out,
wherever you are!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_02_10:
Ooh, a new face! I don’t think
we’ve met before. Probably.
Most likely. Sure!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_03_10:
I’m just your average punk girl!
But it seems like fate wanted us to
meet, huh. Welp, nice to meet you!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0701_04_10:
Ooh! You’ve got a Pokémon with
you, right? We should, like, hang out!
I’ve got nothing better to do!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2701_0702_02_10:
Don’t be shy, pip-squeak! C’mon, have a chat. 
We’re all brothers and sisters here!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_01_10:
I wonder if my Dusclops
is OK...
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_02_10:
Who can guess what she’s
thinking... It’s pointless.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_1031_03_10:
Does that, like, make me
a nihilist? Whatever.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_01_10:
Dusclops doesn’t really make
sense to me. Like, what’s going
on in that head of hers?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_02_10:
It feels empty.
Like it’s just a dark void in there.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0701_03_10:
I guess that’s fine, though...
After all, the one with a dark void in her
heart is ME! Ahahaha!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0702_01_10:
What I DO know about this little
enigma is that she loves me.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2702_0702_02_10:
And, well, I love her, too.
And, like, just having that
friendship is enough for us.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_01_10:
Facing Pokémon with high
Special Defense is, like, 
a hard-core challenge.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_02_10:
Facing Pokémon with low
Special Defense is a total
breeze though.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_1031_03_10:
My Gengar and I have 
been hittin’ the books!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_01_10:
I, like, really want my Gengar to
win more battles.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_02_10:
And, like, when I asked my teacher
about it, she told me Gengar’s got
really high Special Attack and stuff.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_03_10:
So, like, against a Pokémon with
low Special Defense, Gengar’ll be
super strong, I guess.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0701_04_10:
I mean, I wish she woulda told me
that sooner, though. Coulda saved
Gengar some trouble.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0702_01_10:
So, like, I think all this studyin’
is startin’ to help us win.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2703_0702_02_10:
Makes me wanna study harder, ya know?
I mean, we must be doing somethin’ right.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_1031_01_10:
I wonder if I could, like,
move here to Pasio...
Is that possible?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_1031_03_10:
I just wanna stay here and
have fun forever...
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_01_10:
I got transported here to Pasio before
I really knew what was happening, and
now I’m competing in the PML...
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_02_10:
but, like, when the tournament’s
over, we’ll all have to go
back home, right?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_03_10:
After hangin’ out with all the cool
people here, goin’ explorin’ all the time...
I don’t wanna leave.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0701_04_10:
I’d, like, totally swap sides and be
a host or something... I could welcome
other people to Pasio, ya know?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_01_10:
Yep! I made my decision!
Talkin’ to my parents about it
isn’t gonna be very fun, though.
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_02_10:
But ya know what? This is what I
wanna do! And I’m gonna convince
them I made the right decision!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2704_0702_03_10:
Makin’ my way up in the ranks o’
this tournament should help my
cause, too, yeah?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1031_03_10:
Heh heh...
They like to hang out with
their friends!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1032_01_10:
Did you just wing it?
Wait, this one’s bat-ter...
Sink your teeth into this!
ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_1032_02_10:
What’s the first thing little
Crobat learn at school?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_01_10:
What? Not even a giggle?
I doubt you could do any better...
ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_05_10:
Hmm... You’ve got me there!
I dunno! What keeps them going?
ch0083_00_badgirl/2751_0701_07_10:
*sigh*
And I had such high hopes
for that one...
ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0101_01_10:
Ugh! I just can’t!
It’s driving me crazy!
ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0101_02_10: HOW is my Pokémon this cute?!
ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0501_01_10:
My Pokémon is so cute, it hurts...
So pretty and lovely, even when we lose!
ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0601_01_10:
This Pokémon is gonna ruin me—
I know it... It’s just too darn cute!
I can’t help but spoil it rotten.
ch0083_00_badgirl/1901_0601_02_10:
I know it’s bad to spoil your Pokémon—
my parents spoiled me and look how I
turned out! I just can’t help it...
ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0101_01_10:
Wh-why are you looking at me like that!
I didn’t do anything!
ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0501_01_10:
I haven’t done anything bad!
I swear! C’mon, it’s the truth!
ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_01_10:
Sorry... Sometimes I just get this feeling
that, like, everybody around me hates
me and looks down on me.
ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_02_10:
They get scared, and their first reaction
is to challenge me to a Pokémon battle...
ch0083_00_badgirl/1902_0601_03_10:
I think my fashion’s super cute, not scary!
But I guess it gives people the wrong
idea sometimes...
